org.jppf.client.concurrent

Interface JobConfiguration


  • public interface JobConfiguration
    This interface defines the properties that can be provided to a task submitted by a JPPFExecutorService.. These properties include:
    • the job's SLA
    • the job's metadata
    • the job's persistence manager

    • Method Summary
